Question: VANKYO CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
VANKYO

Vista T4 ultra-short-throw laser projector

- Cutting-edge ALPD 4.0 laser technology
- 4K clarity and expanded color gamut reaching 107% of Rec.2020
- Brightness of 2100 lumens
- Dolby Audio and 60W speaker for immersive cinematic experience

470 Roku projector

- Exceptional performance and user-friendly interface
- Bundled with a Roku Express TV stick
- Offers seamless access to a wide range of streaming services on a 250" screen

Performance X3 vertical projector

- Sleek and compact design with a leather carrying handle
- Dolby Audio and exceptional image quality with no rainbow artifacts
- Designed for portability and versatility

CES 2024 Exhibition

- VANKYO to showcase new products at the CES exhibition
- Commitment to innovation and customer expectations
- Focus on enhancing the audiovisual experience
Summary_cn:
万铭优

Vista T4超短焦激光投影仪

- 前沿的ALPD 4.0激光技术
- 4K清晰度和扩展色域达到Rec.2020的107%
- 亮度为2100流明
- Dolby音频和60W扬声器，营造沉浸式的电影体验

470 Roku投影仪

- 出色的性能和用户友好的界面
- 搭载Roku Express电视棒
- 在250英寸屏幕上提供无缝访问各种流媒体服务

Performance X3垂直投影仪

- 精致紧凑设计，带皮革手提手柄
- Dolby音频和出色的图像质量，无彩虹效应
- 为便携性和多功能设计

CES 2024展览会

- 万铭优将在CES展览会上展示新产品
- 致力于创新和满足客户期望
- 专注于提升视听体验
